Articles.Content: Nothke is showing a lot of activity on the forum. I think he's juggling several mods at once
god i can't wait for this release but please take as much time as you need Nothke
Yes, I'm very excited to see a release. I see you're busy with other (small) mods too, like the service module thingy you just released. Take your time, you make quality stuff.

I suspect that this will be released either after .23 or when Sumghai releases her (?) V.4 of FusTek parts.So patience is a virtue here.

Oi! My pronouns are he/his, thank you very much - I took my first name after a certain male outlaw and his band of Merry Men.

The FLEXrack release schedule is in no way connected to the FusTek parts, as I'm simply using this payload standard after the fact.
can't wait for this thing because i need to perform another supply run on my Mun base due to my rovers falling down a crater.
Lemme drop by just to inform you all that the first version will be out in no longer than 2 weeks.

Lemme drop by just to inform you all that the first version will be out in no longer than 2 weeks.

Cannot wait!

Lemme drop by just to inform you all that the first version will be out in no longer than 2 weeks.

Yay, a christmas present

Wow! Great. Thanks Nothke. And you made another mod (The 6S Service Compartment Tubes) available to keep us waiting? Another top of the shelf one I might add. You are the best

[h=2][/h]

Lemme drop by just to inform you all that the first version will be out in no longer than 2 weeks.

Lovely, can't wait

One question, which life support mod will it support, if any?
I am beyond excited for this mod. It looks so good!

Lemme drop by just to inform you all that the first version will be out in no longer than 2 weeks.

*Applause* but now i wonder although this may be stupid question but what is there left to be done even though Nothke you don't have to answer this but it would be nice to know.....

again you don't have to answer and take as much time as you need to complete this amazing pack

Lovely, can't wait

One question, which life support mod will it support, if any?

I would imagine it could support any, as you could simply change the packages to contain any resource you want through the cfg file.

Lemme drop by just to inform you all that the first version will be out in no longer than 2 weeks.

It's happening!

Woooooo!

I would imagine it could support any, as you could simply change the packages to contain any resource you want through the cfg file.

I imagine there will be MM files for that being thrown around on the day of release.

looks awesome. that's stuff i'm looking for my main save.

some informations about the racks science functionality?
How good is the chance were gonna b able to get this as a Christmas present? XD

How good is the chance were gonna b able to get this as a Christmas present? XD

According to notkhe, it will be here before the 23rd.

I'm late for surprises cause everything will be flooded with 0.23 now xD

But anyway, here's an update-surprise:
Wow nothke, looks awesome, now I definitely cannot wait.
Do the racks actually fit within a 2m enclosure when in 4x symmetry like that? Looks like they'd almost be too big, and any "rotating rack" cargo bay would need to be a bit larger than 2m...
Thats awesome! Cant wait for update!
I need this. So much!
Looking good! Are the racks no longer designed to fit 4 of them within a 2.5m cylinder? Looks like these are bigger than the older examples.

Also, just gotta say- the MIX rack would be perfect for Cabana Corp. Data Drives and experiments!

Can you maybe make it so that the rack doesn't drop everything stored?
